title: KMT Healthcare Platform
description: React + Next.js patient monitoring portal with multilingual dashboards, theming, and clinic-ready workflows.
about: Core web experience for Kali Med Tech that brings ECG data, device status, and analytics to hospital ops teams with responsive layouts and localization.
responsibilities: Implemented role-based dashboards with configurable themes, multilingual copy, and responsive cards.
Integrated REST APIs for ECG uploads, AI-assisted insights, and device provisioning workflows.
Collaborated across backend and QA pods to ensure clean data contracts and reliable releases.

title: OOM ECG Analyzer Platform
description: Clinic interface for ECG uploads, AI analysis, and live review queues powered by React and WebSocket.
about: Delivers seamless ECG ingestion with mobile-first views, progress indicators, and alerts for cardiology teams.
responsibilities: Built upload flows with optimistic UI, chunked transfers, and queued notifications.
Streamed AI processing states over WebSockets for real-time clinician feedback.
Ensured accessibility and consistency across tablet, desktop, and kiosk touchpoints.

title: Quality Management System (QMS)
description: Role-based dashboards that coordinate QA, support, and hardware teams with localization and theming.
about: A modular interface that digitizes CAPA tracking, multilingual comms, and compliance reporting for Kali Med Tech teams.
responsibilities: Designed UX flows for admins, QA, and support roles with granular permissions.
Implemented theme and locale switching plus charting for quality indicators.
Added Jest + React Testing Library coverage for mission-critical modules.

title: BLE & UART Monitoring Apps
description: Electron + React desktop tools streaming multiple ECG devices with Chart.js visualizations.
about: Cross-platform monitoring suite capturing device telemetry over BLE and UART, surfacing it to clinicians with real-time graphs.
responsibilities: Handled concurrent BLE connections with resilience for OR environments.
Crafted Chart.js overlays for arrhythmia, signal strength, and lead health.
Synchronized data back to cloud services via secure WebSocket channels.

title: Inventory & Device Tracking Suite
description: Inventory and allocation workflows keeping ECG devices, accessories, and licenses in sync across clinics.
about: Extends the KMT platform with asset lifecycle management, allocation queues, and alerting for device maintenance windows.
responsibilities: Modeled device hierarchies, allocation states, and order workflows inside a reusable component system.
Built status, warranty, and calibration views with filterable, exportable tables.
Automated notifications for returns, servicing, and deployment readiness.
